definition: to select/to detail/to set apart/to appoint
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: Among those whose conversations were monitored is Massimo De Santis, the ref Italy is sending to the World Cup this summer .
sentences.chinese: 其中包括德桑蒂斯，今年意大利選派到世界盃的裁判。

sentences.english: The director cast me as a scientist.
sentences.chinese: 導演選派我扮演科學家。

sentences.english: It's my great honor to be designated to attent this meeting.
sentences.chinese: 我被選派參加這次會議，感到十分榮幸。

sentences.english: The greater number of the deputies sent to Congress were lawyers.
sentences.chinese: 選派到議會的代表很多原來就是律師。

sentences.english: I regard it as a great honor to be designated to attend this meeting.
sentences.chinese: 我被選派參加這次會議，感到十分榮幸。

sentences.english: The teachers selected their best to attend the conference.
sentences.chinese: 教師們選派自己最優秀的分子參加大會。

sentences.english: Therefore, his school selected him as a representative to participate in the national computer skills competition for middle school students.
sentences.chinese: 學校選派他參加全國中學生計算機比賽。

sentences.english: He was cast in the role of Othello.
sentences.chinese: 他被選派扮演奧賽羅的角色。

sentences.english: I regard it as an honour to be nominated to participate this meeting.
sentences.chinese: 我被選派參加這次會議，感到十分榮幸。

sentences.english: We selected him as the representative to the conference.
sentences.chinese: 我們選派他做代表參加會議。

sentences.english: They designate Mr. Yang as director of the laboratory .
sentences.chinese: 他們選派楊先生爲實驗室主任。

sentences.english: They decided not to cast the mini-series with big-name actors.
sentences.chinese: 他們決定不給這部小型連續劇選派名演員。

sentences.english: He detailed a unit on a special service.
sentences.chinese: 他選派一小隊人執行特殊任務。

sentences.english: I feel it a great hnour to take part in this meeting.
sentences.chinese: 我被選派參加這次會議，感到十分榮幸。

sentences.english: Please send a speaker from your group to make a summary of your discussion.
sentences.chinese: 請你們這一組選派一位代表來做總結論。

sentences.english: A lawyer selected by the U.S. Embassy is representing him.
sentences.chinese: 一名美國大使館選派的律師在爲他辯護。
